fields.name: Subalignments:
fields.value: Head, Killing, Support, Protective, Investigative, Power, Other

fields.name: Features:
fields.value:
- 988: Mastermind and 989: Assassin will always spawn.
- Factional chat
- No factional kill 
- Town members converted to the Unseen become Unseen roles based on their original role.
- Only one Unseen Power can be alive at a time - if you attempt to convert another Town Power role, it will fail.
- If the Mastermind dies, the Assassin becomes the Mastermind.
- If the Assassin dies or becomes the Mastermind, the newest Unseen member will become an Assassin. 
- Only the starting Assassin can become the Mastermind; if the second Mastermind dies, they will not be replaced.

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Eliminate those you wish to not convert, or those who will not join you.

meta.inherit_fields: Goal:Eliminate those you wish to not convert, or those who will not join you.
